body.p:
To His Excellency. Thomas E Bramlett
Governor of the Comth of Kentucky

The undersigned citizens of Lyon County Ky, State, that Charles Braswell a citizen of said County was indicted for larceny at the term of the Lyon Circuit Court. for 1860. They state that they are informed & believe that said Braswell made his appearance in said Court. at the June term of 1860 but arrived one day too late. and his bond was taken as forfeited They say that. they are informed & believe that said Braswell was in error, as to the week in which the Court commenced. that he arrived on tuesday supposing the term commen^c^ed on the following monday, whereas the bond was taken as forfeited the preceeding day.

They state that they have good reasons for believing that said Charles Braswell is now in the naval service of the United States. the bond ^of $500, the sum of $150. has been paid to the Comths Atty for his commission, the sum of $350 is asked to be remitted--^ was for the amount Wherefore they petition your Excellency to quash the bond. forefeited. and that N T Braswell who is surety on said bond be forever acquitted from the payment of the same
Eddyville Ky Dec 1863,
